Description: Limestone lintel of Rudjka: the slab bears a single line of text, carved in fair sunk relief, containing the titles and name of Rudjka, inspector of pure-priests of Werkhafra, who was an official of the Pyramid of Khafra. No colour remains.
Curator's comments: Companion to door-drum (1897,0511.222). Bibliography: B. Porter & R. Moss, 'Topographical Bibliography of Ancient Egyptian Hieroglyphic Texts, Reliefs and Paintings' III (Oxford: Clarendon Press), 67; Part 2, 308.
Bibliographic references: James 1961 / Hieroglyphic texts from Egyptian stelae, etc. Part 1 (pl.8)
Associated places: Named in inscription: Pyramid of Khafra
